title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1100.3 - Representation by court-assigned counsel in the Appellate Division
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1100.3 - Representation by court-assigned counsel in the Appellate Division

State Regulations

In any appeal by the People from an order
pursuant to this Part, the Appellate Division shall assign counsel to represent
a defendant who is represented in the superior court by court-assigned counsel, and may direct that the court-assigned counsel in the superior court represent
the defendant on appeal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1100.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
